name: Escape From Ransomware
description:
Escape From Ransomware is a platform game where you are tested on your knowledge to counter threats related to Ransomware. During the course of the game, you will be tested on the handling of suspicious emails, suspicious websites, unpatched laptops, infected files and encrypted files.

Game concepts and play detail is provided in the youtube video below

Ransomware concepts used in the game is detailed in the youtube video below
